about_the_game: Scare Girl is a free roam survival game With a grassy forest environment . U start In a Forest And Your Trying To Collect 10 White Treasure Chest To Open A Door to Survive. Scare Girl She Out There to attack u. U spawn as a girl with a flashlight In a forest and ur trying To escape By collecting 10 Treasure Chest to open an escape door. Scare Girl Is fast and so are u. I Included a forest map a character that u start with is a girl and a scary character to chase u and trees and grass land and white Treasure Chest collectables and an escape door. And Ill Update U With New Maps. Playing the game is like a breath fresh of air in the forest Running From a scary Killer and ur trying to escape The forest. She can see u and not see u if u are far away. She makes noise if she see u. So u are a girl that's trying to escape basically. Running will help u get away from her. The game is basically running from a scary character and collecting white Treasure Chest to open an escape door In a forest. So search for the white Treasure Chest around the trees to escape.

name: Scare Girl

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: windows 10
  • Processor: 1 Ghz or Faster Processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 2GB / AMD
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: A Scary game In The Forest And Your Trying To Collect 10 Treasure Chest To Open A Door
